REF AD2.22.5.1.3 COORDINATION WITH NETWORK : READ : 'CDG AIRPORT PDS IS DIRECTLY CONNECTED WITH THE NETWORK MANAGER OPERATION CENTER (NMOC) FOR DATA EXCHANGE (COLLABORATIVE MANAGEMENT OF FLIGHT UPDATES). DATA ARE AUTOMATICALLY EXCHANGED THROUGH DPI AND API MESSAGES, WHICH INCLUDE TARGET TAKE-OFF TIMES, TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT BY NETWORK MANAGER OPERATION CENTER FOR EN ROUTE TRAFFIC PREDICTION AND FOR SLOT ALLOCATION. DPI AND API ARE OF DIFFERENT TYPES : GENERAL ARRIVAL PLANNING INFORMATION (G-API) PREDICTED DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION EARLY DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (E-DPI) TARGET DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (T-DPI) ATC DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (A-DPI) CANCEL DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (C-DPI) THE REA MESSAGE IS NO LONGER USED AND REPLACED BY DPI MESSAGES SYSTEMATICALLY AND AUTOMATICALLY SENT. INSTEAD OF : 'CDG AIRPORT PDS IS DIRECTLY CONNECTED WITH THE NETWORK MANAGER OPERATION CENTER FOR DATA EXCHANGE (COLLABORATIVE MANAGEMENT OF FLIGHT UPDATES). DATA ARE AUTOMATICALLY EXCHANGED THROUGH DPI MESSAGES, WHICH INCLUDE TARGET TAKE-OFF TIMES, TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT BY NETWORK MANAGER OPERATION CENTER FOR EN ROUTE TRAFFIC PREDICTION AND FOR SLOT ALLOCATION. DPI ARE OF DIFFERENT TYPES : EARLY DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (E-DPI) TARGET DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (T-DPI) ATC DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION (A-DPI) THE REA MESSAGE IS NO LONGER USED AND REPLACED BY DPI MESSAGES SYSTEMATICALLY AND AUTOMATICALLY SENT.'
TAXIWAY EXCURSIONS HOT SPOT MAP (INSERT 1 - FORBIDDEN TURN) : READ 'TURNING BETWEEN MD1 AND B' INSTEAD OF 'TURNING BETWEEN MD1 AND M' REF AMDT AIRAC 02/2024. AD2.20.3.3.2.4.3

SX0172/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT LFPG/PARIS/CHARLES DE GAULLE REHABILITATION WORKS ON TWY U VALIDITY: 03OCT24-16DEC24 24 HR CLOSURE OF THE FOLLOWING TAXIWAYS: - U BTN TWY UC3 EXCLUDED AND TWY UC4 INCLUDED - U BTN AIRCRAFT STAND M06 EXCLUDED AND TWY UT1 EXCLUDED

SX0164/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT LFPG/PARIS/CHARLES DE GAULLE AD REFURBISHMENT WORKS ON TWY R BTN RT2 AND RT4 EXCLUDED VALIDITY: 16SEP24, 0300 - 20DEC24, 1500 (UTC) 24 HR CLOSURE OF THE FLW TWY: - R BTN RT2 AND RT4 TWY EXCLUDED, - RT3, - TA2, - W2. TWY R CLOSURE BTN RT2 AND RT4 TWY GENERATES A MODIFICATION OF PREFERENTIAL TAX DIRECTIONS TO THE SOUTH OF THE PLATFORM AND IN PARTICULAR TO CLR RWY 26R, TO ACCESS AND EXIT THE TERMINAL 2. ANY CHANGE TO THE INITIAL DATES WILL BE CONFIRMED BY NOTAM.

SX0163/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT LFPG/PARIS/CHARLES DE GAULLE VALIDITY:16SEP24-02NOV24 RECONFIGURATION WORKS ON AIRCRAFT STATION U10 AND REFURBISHMENT OF A SECTION OF TAXIWAY A. THIS WORK REQUIRES THE CLOSURE OF A SECTION OF TAXIWAY A 24 HOURS PER DAY. PHASE 1: TAXIWAY A BETWEEN STANDS S24 AND S30 24 HOURS PER DAY: AIRCRAFT STANDS CLOSED 24 HOURS PER DAY: U10 S24 TO S30 IMPACT ON OPERATIONS : THE CLOSURE OF A SECTION OF TAXIWAY A BETWEEN AIRCRAFT STANDS S24 TO S30 CREATES A DEAD-END: - ONLY AIRCRAFT OPERATING TERMINAL 1 AND SIERRA STANDS CAN ACCESS TAXIWAY A IN ITS WESTERN SECTION - ONLY AIRCRAFT OPERATING TERMINAL 1 STANDS CAN ACCESS TAXIWAY A3 - NOTE THAT TAXIWAY A3 IS RESTRICTED TO AIRCRAFT WITH A MAXIMUM WINGSPAN OF 61M - S23 AIRCRAFT STAND IS LIMITED TO AIRCRAFT WITH A MAXIMUM WINGSPAN OF 36M. THE AIRCRAFT STANDS LISTED BELOW AND LOCATED NEAR THE WORK ZONE ARE SUBJECT TO SPECIAL PUSH-BACK PROCEDURES: U07: RED PUSH MANDATORY ON TAXIWAY A S23: PUSH-BACK ON TAXIWAY A HEADING WEST PROHIBITED. PUSH-BACK HEADING SOUTH ON TAXIWAY A3 ALLOWED FOR DEPARTURE TO TAXIWAY A S31: PUSH-BACK ON TAXIWAY A HEADING EAST PROHIBITED. PUSH-BACK ON TAXIWAY A HEADING SOUTH ALLOWED FOR DEPARTURE TO TAXIWAY NA1. THE AIRCRAFT STANDS LISTED BELOW ARE SUBJECT TO RED PUSH PROCEDURES ONLY: X03 Y03 Y05 Y08 Z03 Z04 Z05 Z07 Z09 THE AIRCRAFT STANDS LISTED BELOW ARE SUBJECT TO THE WEST HEADING PUSH-BACK PROCEDURES ONLY: S06 TO S22 THE AIRCRAFT STANDS LISTED BELOW ARE SUBJECT TO WEST HEADING TOWING PROCEDURES ONLY: S6B S7B S8B S9B

SX0108/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT LFPG/PARIS/CHARLES DE GAULLE VALIDITY: 30JUN24-31OCT24 OPENING OF JULIETT AREAS FROM J51 TO J57 DESCRIPTION : - OPN OF STANDS J51, J53, J55, J57 - CREATION OF TWY E9 (PROHIBITED FOR A380/B748/A124/C5) PREFERENTIAL DIRECTION OF TFC: - TJ1 AS AN ENTRY - TJ2 AS AN EXIT AN APN MANAGEMENT SER IS IMPLEMENTED UP TO THE INDICATIONS OF INTERMEDIATE HLDG POINTS TJ1 AND TJ2 FOR THE BENEFIT OF PRKG STANDS J51 TO J57.
SX0105/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT LFPG/PARIS/CHARLES DE GAULLE VALIDITY: 13JUN24-31OCT24 CROSSROAD MODIFICATION OF TWYS FN5/RN1/RN2/RN3

SX0189/23 AIP SUPPLEMENT LFBB/BORDEAUX FIR VALIDITY:02NOV23-27MAR2025 IMPLEMENTATION OF FPL BUFFER ZONE (FBZ - FPL BUFFER ZONE) ASSOCIATED WITH TEMPO RESTRICTED AREAS IN MEDIUM AND HIGH ALT LF-R343L (ZENA PERIGORD LOW), LF-R343M (ZENA PERIGORD MEDIUM) AND LF-R343H (ZENA PERIGORD HIGH). LF-R343LZ FL165/FL195 LF-R343MZ FL195/FL245 LF-R343HZ FL395/UNL ACTIVATION SCHEDULES STATED IN FRANCE AUP/UUP.

SX0214/23 AIP SUPPLEMENT LFBB/FIR - CREATION OF TWO TEMPORARY RESTRICTED AREAS (ZRT) FOR THE UNMANNED STATE AIRCRAFTS BASED IN COGNAC VALIDITY: 30NOV23-14MAY25 GAT AND OAT COMPULSORY AVOIDANCE: ZRT EMS UAV SFC/FL135 ZRT 260 LOW FL065/FL075 THIS ZRT ACTIVATION IS POSSIBLE AT ANY TIME WITH 1 HOUR PRIOR NOTICE.

FOR OVERFLIGHTS OR ARRIVALS, LOGON MUST BE INITIATED BY THE PILOT, WITH SUFFICIENT NOTICE (BETWEEN 10 AND 25 MINUTES BEFORE ENTERING THE CRNA), TO ENSURE THAT THE CONNECTION IS ESTABLISHED, AND WITH THE FIRST FRENCH ACC CROSSED. IF LOGON HAS ALREADY BEEN ESTABLISHED WITH AN ADJACENT UPSTREAM ACC PROVIDING LOGON FORWARD, OR IF FORWARD HAS FAILED, ADVANCE NOTICE IS NOT REQUIRED. FOR FLIGHTS DEPARTING FROM FRENCH AIRFIELDS, LOGON MUST BE INITIATED NO LATER THAN CROSSING FL150. IF LOGON IS IMPOSSIBLE FOR A TECHNICAL REASON KNOWN OR UNKNOWN TO THE E PILOT, THE CREW WILL ANNOUNCE 'UNABLE CPDLC'. REFERENCE AIP FRANCE GEN 3.4-9.

SX0048/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT LFRR/LFFF CREATION OF 2 TEMPORARY DANGER AREAS (ZDT) ZENA ATLANTIQUE LF-D120 TEMPORAIRE MANCHE AND LFD120 TEMPORAIRE ATLANTIQUE AND MODIFICATION OF DANGER AREAS LF-D5, LF-D7, LF-D12, LF-D14B AND LFD15B IN UPPER AIRSPACE VALIDITY: 28MAR24 - 27MAR25 ACTIVITY INVOLVING DEFENSE COMBAT ACFT OF ALL TYPES, FLYING UNDER OAT, IN ALL FLYING CONDITIONS, REQUIRING THE CREATION OF A TEMPORARY DANGER AREA SIZED FOR TRAINING WITH NEW WEAPONS. POSSIBLE ACTIVATION H24. D120 TEMPORAIRE ATLANTIQUE FL195/UNL D120 TEMPORAIRE MANCHE FL195/FL305 GAT : COMPLY WITH THE INSTRUCTIONS OF THE USUAL ATS UNITS BASED ON THE FOLLOWING RULES : LF-D 120 TEMPORAIRE ATLANTIQUE PENETRABLE TO GAT TRAFFIC ON TACTICAL COORDINATION. LF-D 120 TEMPORAIRE MANCHE PENETRABLE TO GAT TRAFFIC ON NOTIFICATION ******************************************** - LF-D 5 AND LF-D 7 : UPPER LIMIT INCREASED TO FL 305, H24. - LF-D 14 B AND LF-D 15 B : UPPER LIMIT LOWERED TO FL 305, H24. - LF-D 12 GA, LF-D 12 NA AND LF-D 12 SA : UPPER LIMIT INCREASED TO FL 305, H24. - LF-D 12 GB, LF-D 12 NB AND LF-D 12 SB : LOWER LIMIT INCREASED TO FL 305, H24.

CHANGE OF VERTICAL LIMITS OF FBZ ASSOCIATED WITH LF-D12GA, D12NA, D12SA, D12GB, D12NB, D12SB, D14B AND D15B AREAS : LF-D12GAZ : FL195/FL305 LF-D12NAZ : FL195/FL305 LF-D12SAZ : FL195/FL305 LF-D12GBZ : FL305/UNL LF-D12NBZ : FL305/UNL LF-D12SBZ : FL305/UNL LF-D14BZ : FL275/FL305 LF-D15BZ : FL275/FL305.
